import React from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourdata from './assets/data/tours' import'./toursdetails.css' const ToursDetails = () => { const id = useParams() const tour = tourdata.find(tour=> tour.id ==id) const {photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour return (

{title}
) } export default ToursDetails
